abstract: Alinta Ltd. has received a management buyout proposal backed by Macquarie Bank Ltd. in what would be the country’s largest utility buyout.
snippet: Alinta Ltd. has received a management buyout proposal backed by Macquarie Bank Ltd. in what would be the country’s largest utility buyout.
lead_paragraph: SYDNEY, Australia, Tuesday, Jan. 9 (Bloomberg News)  Alinta Ltd., Australia’s biggest energy transmission company, has received a management buyout proposal backed by Macquarie Bank Ltd. in what would be the country’s largest utility buyout.

headline.main: Australian Utility Giant Gets Buyout Offer From Managers
headline.print_headline: Australian Utility Giant Gets Buyout Offer From Managers
